title: Black Friday
description: An angry teenager, his identity lost in the social system of American justice, finds purpose and direction as a member in the New World Army. His assignment? Begin the destruction of the United States economy. It starts in your hometown next November 23, 2012. Are you ready? Black Friday is a microcosm of the world's perception of and reaction to American avarice and cultural dominance.
author: B.Y. Rogers
